name: Keep Blobby Alive
description:
You have an extremely oversized pocket pet game, and you need to feed and play with your pet Blobby! Smash grubs and flies to feed Blobby. Collect coins so you can play with Blobby. Don't leave Blobby sad or hungry for too long, or it will perish :(. Can you keep Blobby fed, happy and alive until the timer runs out?

Controls:
* Arrow keys to move
* Press Z to jump
* Press X to slash attack

Hints:
* There are two buttons, one to feed and one to play. Slash the button to activate
* Collecting coins allows you to activate the play button
* Smashing grubs and flies allows you to activate the feed button

Tools:
* Godot v3.0.2
* aseprite
* Bfxr Standalone V1.4.1

Credits:
* @slunkey Developer
* @judy-l Developer
* @woobear85 Art

Background Music Credit:
